name: Candy Kingdom
startIntroPart1: Hail, Princess Bubblegum, benevolent ruler of the Candy Kingdom. Under your rule, the Candy people live in harmony and prosperity, the result of your wisdom, kindness, and scientific prowess.
startIntroPart2: Princess, all is not well in the land of Ooo. Your people look to you now to protect their peaceful way of life. With the power of Science, can you ensure a path to prosperity and build a civilisation that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your resistance is mathematically unsound. Surrender now or face the consequences!
defeated: Ugh! This is highly improbable! Science will correct this... eventually.
introduction: As the ruler of the Candy Kingdom, I have far more important matters than dealing with you.
neutralNo: That's a hard no from me.
afterPeace: Finally. Conflict is such an inefficient use of resources.
tradeRequest: Consider this a gift from the most advanced civilization you'll ever encounter.
unique: Free Great Person <upon founding a city>
